content.rendered:
As an Electrical Contractor Baltimore MD, we are here to provide electrical services to customers throughout the area. We offer electrical installations for new and existing homes. For new home constructions, our electricians can work with other contractors to get your project done on time and within your budget. Some of the main services that our electricians provide include the following:

  • Fuse Box Upgrades
  • Generator Installation and Repair
  • Smoke Detectors
  • Attic Fans
  • Indoor and Outdoor Lighting
  • Security Lighting
  • Surge Protection
  • Outlets and Switches
  • Service Panels
  • New Wiring
  • 24–Hour Electrical Repair
  • Maintenance Plans
  • Don’t hesitate to call the electrical experts for your next electrical service.

Certified Electrician – Electrical Contractor Baltimore MD

It is important to hire a certified electrician for any type of electrical work, from new installations to repair. A certified electrician will make sure the work is completed and up to code. Our electricians always have your safety in mind, and we offer installation, replacement, or electrical repair. We get the job done right the first time, and our electricians can go over ways that you can help maintain your electrical system and avoid any fire hazards.

Electrical Installation

The electricians offer installation for electrical equipment and wiring for your entire home. Do you have an older home with wiring that needs to be upgraded or replaced? Our electricians make sure all new wiring meets modern standards and local building code standards. Whether you need a fuse box upgrade or another part of your electrical system replaced, our certified electricians can take care of any residential electrical need. Never try to install new electrical equipment or wiring on your own. This can cause damage to you or your home.

24/7 Electrical Repair with our  Electricians

Our electricians will get to your home ASAP to resolve the issue. We have many years of experience in this business, and we can handle any type of electrical repair, from faulty wiring to a broken light switch. We also repair and replace fuse boxes and offer generator repair. Don’t take any chances with a contractor who is not certified to work with electrical equipment. Call us for emergency electrical repair, any time night or day!

Call our Electricians  for Electrical Service

Call our electricians for electrical service. We are dedicated to your safety and to customer satisfaction. That’s why we offer a 100% guarantee on all of our work. Our electricians are certified and highly trained. They do all electrical work up to code and with quality service, from new installation to 24/7 electrical repair. No matter what type of electrical service you need in your home, our skilled electricians will get the job done with minimal disruption to you.
